plot: Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.
title: Nya hyss av Emil i Lönneberga
plot_es: Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.
original_name: Nya hyss av Emil i Lönneberga
plot_en: Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.
